availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Allen Beazley (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Elizabeth Simpson. Father of William S. Beazley, Henrietta Beazley, and Richard Allen Beazley. Farmer in Garrard County in 1850. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 248A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Lancaster, p. 21.
